'''Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Monetoo]] in [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]].
